amendment.description: To provide a blood quantum requirement for Federal recognition of Indian tribes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4028 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 4028 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S996-1004, S1040) To provide a blood quantum requirement for Federal recognition of Indian tribes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4028 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899.
